person.persName: William H. Kirtley (Rockcastle County, Kentucky, merchant, attorney, circuit court clerk, and private Rockcastle & Lincoln Co Home Guard)

body.p: Rockcastle County, Kentucky, merchant, attorney, court clerk, and soldier. Kentucky native. Married Elizabeth H. Kirtley. Father of Mary C. Kirtley, William L. Kirtley, and Ann Kirtley. Postmaster of Mount Vernon, Kentucky, from October 1, 1844, to December 29, 1836. Merchant and assistant marshal for the Census of the United States in Rockcastle County in 1850. Attorney in Mount Vernon in 1860. Served in the Rockcastle and Lincoln County Home Guards as a private from May 1862 to July 1862. Clerk of the Rockcastle Circuit Court in Mount Vernon from 1862 to 1863.
